resources.string: Release the panda\'s numbered block by tapping the column where you want it to fall.
A block disappears when it\'s number matches the amount of blocks in it\'s row/column.
Brick blocks break, then reveal a numbered block when other blocks adjacent to it disappear.
The counter shows how many drops till a row of stones pushes up all your blocks.
The game is over when your blocks are pushed past the top or when there is nowhere to place a block.
